member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS9
member.summary: Indicates whether or not support exists for mesh shaders, values of SV_RenderTargetArrayIndex that are 8 or greater, typed resource 64-bit integer atomics, derivative and derivative-dependent texture sample operations, and the level of support for WaveMMA (wave_matrix) operations.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS9.MeshShaderPipelineStatsSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether or not mesh shaders are supported. true if supported, otherwise false.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS9.MeshShaderSupportsFullRangeRenderTargetArrayIndex
member.summary: Indicates whether or not values of SV_RenderTargetArrayIndex that are 8 or greater are supported. true if supported, otherwise false.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS9.AtomicInt64OnTypedResourceSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether or not typed resource 64-bit integer atomics are supported. true if supported, otherwise false.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS9.AtomicInt64OnGroupSharedSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether or not 64-bit integer atomics are supported on groupshared variables. true if supported, otherwise false.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS9.DerivativesInMeshAndAmplificationShadersSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether or not derivative and derivative-dependent texture sample operations are supported. true if supported, otherwise false.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS9.WaveMMATier
member.summary: Indicates the level of support for WaveMMA (wave_matrix) operations.
